attributes.action: Stop the proposed Greenwich Congestion Charge from going ahead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: London already has a 'congestion' zone that has NOT stopped people from driving into Central London. It is clearly just a money-making excercise that has no affect. We do not want anymore 'stealth taxes'. There are better ways to control the traffic and congestion in Greenwich. Charging people to drive in the area is not one of them!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the proposed Greenwich Congestion Charge from going ahead."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13016.asp

Prime Minister's Office
